name: You
text: What the hell was up with that cave?!
You now understand your parents warnings about not entering the cave when playing outside.
Exhausted from this ordeal you march onward into the darkness...
After a while a red shimmer catches your eye, this must be the gemstone you were asked to get.
You pick it up. It feels cold to the touch.
You got what you came here for, it's time to head back... Or you could take the opportunity to explore the cave further.
